column2: this was a surprise.  I ordered the Tonkatsu Black for lunch and it was delicious.  Noodles were cooked just right and had that bounce to it
column3: and the broth had really great flavor.  The rest of the ingredients were tasty but fairly standard
column4: but the important parts were really good.  Service was quick and we had no trouble getting a seat.  I'd come back for lunch any day.
